summary: A young man is warned by a captain about a temptress; nonetheless, he finds himself falling in love with her.
cast: Marlene Dietrich|Lionel Atwill|Edward Everett Horton|Alison Skipworth|Cesar Romero|Don Alvarado|Tempe Pigott|Francisco Moreno|Max Barwyn|Eumenio Blanco|Eddie Borden|Jill Dennett|Luisa Espinel|John George|Lawrence Grant|Hank Mann|Edwin Maxwell|Kewpie Morgan|Stanley Price|Donald Reed|Constantine Romanoff|Henry Roquemore|Charles Sellon|Morgan Wallace
title: El diablo es una mujer
